definitions.text: appropriate to or befitting a god; ; ; -R.H.Roveref
examples: man must play God for he has acquired certain godlike powers

definitions.text: being or having the nature of a god; -J.G.Frazier; ; ; -J.G.Saxe
examples: the custom of killing the divine king upon any serious failure of his...powers
'Tis wise to learn; 'tis God-like to create
